org.jooby.spi

Interface NativeRequest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ServletServletRequest

    public interface NativeRequest
    Minimal/basic implementation of HTTP request. A server implementor must provide an implementation of NativeRequest.
    Since:
    0.5.0
    Author:
    edgar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Cookie> cookies() 
      List<NativeUpload> files(String name)
      Get all the files for the provided name or an empty list.

      Get the first header for the provided name or a empty list.
      List<String> headerNames() 
      List<String> headers(String name)
      Get all the headers for the provided name or a empty list.
      InputStream in()
      Input stream that represent the body.

      List<String> paramNames() 
      List<String> params(String name)
      Get all the params for the provided name or a empty list.

      boolean secure() 
      void startAsync()
      Put the request in async mode.
      <T> T upgrade(Class<T> type)
      Upgrade the request to something else...like a web socket.

    • Method Detail

      • method

        String method()
        Returns:
        The name of the HTTP method with which this request was made, for example, GET, POST, or PUT.

      • path

        String path()
        Returns:
        The part of this request's URL from the protocol name up to the query string in the first line of the HTTP request

      • paramNames

        List<String> paramNames()
                 throws Exception
        Returns:
        List with all the parameter names from query string plus any other form/multipart param names (excluding file uploads). This method should NOT returns null, absence of params is represented by an empty list.
        Throws:
        Exception - If param extraction fails.

      • params

        List<String> params(String name)
             throws Exception
        Get all the params for the provided name or a empty list.
        Parameters:
        name - Parameter name.
        Returns:
        Get all the params for the provided name or a empty list.
        Throws:
        Exception - If param parsing fails.

      • headers

        List<String> headers(String name)
        Get all the headers for the provided name or a empty list.
        Parameters:
        name - Header name.
        Returns:
        Get all the headers for the provided name or a empty list.

      • header

        Optional<String> header(String name)
        Get the first header for the provided name or a empty list.
        Parameters:
        name - Header name.
        Returns:
        The first header for the provided name or a empty list.

      • headerNames

        List<String> headerNames()
        Returns:
        All the header names or an empty list.

      • cookies

        List<Cookie> cookies()
        Returns:
        All the cookies or an empty list.

      • files

        List<NativeUpload> files(String name)
                  throws IOException
        Get all the files for the provided name or an empty list.
        Parameters:
        name - File name.
        Returns:
        All the files or an empty list.
        Throws:
        IOException - If file parsing fails.

      • in

        InputStream in()
        throws IOException
        Input stream that represent the body.
        Returns:
        Body as an input stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - If body read fails.

      • ip

        String ip()
        Returns:
        The IP address of the client or last proxy that sent the request.

      • protocol

        String protocol()
        Returns:
        The name and version of the protocol the request uses in the form protocol/majorVersion.minorVersion, for example, HTTP/1.1

      • secure

        boolean secure()
        Returns:
        True if this request was made using a secure channel, such as HTTPS.

      • upgrade

        <T> T upgrade(Class<T> type)
       throws Exception
        Upgrade the request to something else...like a web socket.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Upgrade type.
        Parameters:
        type - Upgrade type.
        Returns:
        A instance of the upgrade.
        Throws:
        Exception - If the upgrade fails or it is un-supported.
        See Also:
        NativeWebSocket

      • startAsync

        void startAsync()
        Put the request in async mode.
